text: Aubert Pallascio (August 19, 1937 – July 5, 2020) was a Canadian actor and comedian. He was best known for playing Pierre Trudeau in the 1980 movie The Kidnapping of the President. He was nominated in 1996 for a Genie Award for Best Performance by an Actor in a Supporting Role for his role in Black List (Liste noire). He was born in Montreal.
